---

## Description

What would you like to see added or improved?

## Motivation

Why do you think this feature is important? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution

How would you implement this? Any specific approach or design you have in mind?

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches have you considered?

## Additional Context

Any mockups, examples, or other context that might help?
